title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.9 - Notification to court of incapacity of prisoner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.9 - Notification to court of incapacity of prisoner

State Regulations

If the director of a hospital in which a prisoner is
hospitalized pursuant to this Part has reason to believe that the prisoner may
be an incapacitated defendent as defined in article 730 of the Criminal

Procedure Law, the director shall so notify the court in which the criminal
charges are pending. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
18.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
